CaroGen Highlights

Developed novel AVIDIO platform that delivers multiple transgenes
Artificial Virus for Infectious Diseases & Immuno-Oncology

Two candidates in late stage pre-clinical (IND enabling) studies
CARG-2020 for ovarian cancer; CARG-201 for Chronic Hepatitis B

Broad and expanding patent portfolio
Issued composition of matter and methods of use patents

HBV program supported by over $10 million in NIH & DoD grants
Expect continued support for Phase 1 clinical studies
